name: weak-armor

effect.black-white: Whenever a physical move hits this Pokémon, its Speed rises one stage and its Defense falls one stage. This ability triggers on every hit of a multiple-hit move.
effect.black-2-white-2: Whenever a physical move hits this Pokémon, its Speed rises one stage and its Defense falls one stage. This ability triggers on every hit of a multiple-hit move.

short_effect: Raises Speed and lowers Defense by one stage each upon being hit by a physical move.

flavor_text.black-white: Physical attacks lower Defense and raise Speed.
flavor_text.black-2-white-2: Physical attacks lower Defense and raise Speed.
